prompt: Create a modern search results page with a clean white background. At the top, include a search bar with a magnifying glass icon on the left, placeholder text 'Search products...', and a subtle gray border with rounded corners. Below the search bar, display a results counter in gray text reading 'Showing 245 results'. The main content area should feature a vertically scrollable list of result cards, each with a soft shadow, white background, and rounded edges. Each card should include a 120x120 pixel product image placeholder on the left, followed by a bold product title, a price in green, a 5-star rating with yellow stars, and a short description in gray. Place a blue 'View Details' button at the bottom right of each card. Ensure 16px padding around all elements and 12px spacing between cards for a clean, airy layout.
